column3: Pretested linting prior to creating PR:\nhttps://travis-ci.org/RandyMcMillan/bitcoin/jobs/606139243\nhttps://travis-ci.org/RandyMcMillan/bitcoin/jobs/606139261
What is the point of this? If you want to fix typos, sure. Please go ahead and fix all of them, but this one-off change isn't worth it.
Agree, please try and avoid opening trivial PRs like this.
Yeah all of them can be done in one commit
> Yeah all of them can be done in one commit\n\nThanks for the guidance. I will resubmit using this PR.
